entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -13.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 11:28 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -13.9°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
